name: AAdventure
description:
Game was made in Godot(3.4)! Submited to: Black And White Jam #0.(9) whitch was 11 days long Game Jam.

Features:
  • FULL controller support (dualshock, xbox)
  • Unique MECHANIC
  • Graphic with only 2 COLORS
  • Special INVERT button
  • Build in FULLSCREEN settings
  • and more!...
Controls: Keyboard and mouse:
  • Move: WSAD, Arrows
  • Shoot: Q, E
  • Dialog, Upgrades: Mouse
Controller:
  • Move: Left Lever
  • Shoot: R1-RB, L1-LB
  • Dialog, Upgrades: D-Pad

Happy birthday Blodyx! 29.6.2022
